com.pingidentity.sdk.provision.groups.request

Interface ReadGroupsRequestContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ProvisioningRequestContext

    public interface ReadGroupsRequestContext
extends ProvisioningRequestContext
    An interface that represents the request context for a read groups operation. It contains all the information needed to fulfill the request, e.g. filter.
    Since:
    8.0
